FormMeta.name: xx_shell_gritbin

field.label: Is this a valid issue for repair?
field.name: rad_valid

field.label: Any special safety concerns for the crew to be aware of?
field.name: txta_safety

field.label: Attach any photos of the issue and the location
field.name: file_AIY9Q630RJM

field.label: White paint sprayed around the issue?
field.name: rad_whitepaint

html.name: ahtm_continue33
html.content: When inspection complete, click on the button below to close off your task and reallocate the case to the scheduling team.

html.name: ahtm_bad
html.content: Close the case as incorrectly reported. This will send the customer an email to advise them of this and the email will contain the following reason code (please exercise caution in your language!).

field.label: Case Close Reason (Invalid Case)
field.name: txt_caseclosereasonbad
field.value: The case has been closed as invalid because ....

Button.name: but_IYB01AJ3
Button.label: Confirm - Do you really want to close this pothole as invalid?

html.name: html_LZJ9KO94
html.content:
Schedule the job on the Aardvark 3000 system.  

When you've finished scheduling the work on the system, click on the button below to close off your task and reallocate the case to the crew for repair.

field.label: Attach a photo of the repaired hole
field.name: file_AIY9Q630

html.name: ahtm_continue
html.content: When the repair is complete, click on the button below to close off your task and reallocate the case back to the inspection team for re-inspection.

field.label: Upload a photo or video of the repair
field.name: file_TLV7IS38

field.label: Rate the quality of the repair
field.name: num_PXY44KW9

html.name: html_U5D4UYG0
html.content:
When the reinspection is complete click on the button below to close off your task and close the Pothole case as complete. 

You may amend the case closing code if you wish or leave it as defaulted.

html.name: html_WDL64XW7
html.content:
Your processing of the pothole workflow is now complete and the case has been progressed to stage [txt_case_status].

You may now close this browser window.

field.label: Search by street or postcode to identify the location of the problem.
field.name: txt_postcode

header.name: hrd_KKM20FH2
header.label: Show us on the map exactly where the fault is.

html.name: html_CU345GV0
html.content: The Customer has requested to be linked to the Request, but has not yet been identified.  Confirm they want to be associated with the existing [typeofissue] case and then search for and select the customer and click on the "Link to Case" button.  There is also the option for the customer to add additional Notes to the Case.

field.label: If you want to be notified about the outcome of the issue, we need your details - is that OK?
field.name: rad_OK_details

html.name: html_agentidentifycust
html.content: Now please click the "Next" button to identify the customer.

html.name: html_citizenidentify
html.content: Now please click the "Next" button to identify yourself / validate your contact details.

html.name: html_M1X5A676
html.content: That's fine.  We'll note your interest that this be fixed, but be aware that you won't receive any notification when the issue is fixed (since we won't keep a record of who you are!).

field.label: Do you have any additional notes or comments to add to the existing Case?
field.name: rad_addnotes1

field.label: Do you have any photos or video you need to upload?
field.helptext: If so, select "Yes" and an upload dialog will appear.
field.name: rad_5

html.name: html_upload_information
html.content: If you have any photos (maximum 3MB) that would help us progress your report of this [typeofissue] please use the button below to attach them. You may experience a slight pause whilst the files are uploaded to our web server.  jpg and png format pictures are supported.

field.label: Would you like to receive case updates?
field.name: rad_identify

field.label: Email
field.name: email
field.message: You must enter a valid email address

field.label: Mobile
field.name: tel_mobile
field.message: Please enter the valid mobile number

field.label: Would you like to receive case updates?
field.name: rad_identifyc

html.name: html_detailsadd
html.content: You will be able to amend your details for this transaction on the following page - just click "Continue"

html.name: ahtm_portal_ad
html.content: Note that these would be automatically filled in if you were logged into our customer portal - register and login today!

field.label: Email address
field.name: eml_email_citizen
field.message: You must enter a valid email address

field.label: Phone number
field.name: num_telephone_citizen
field.message: Please enter the valid phone number

header.name: hrd_XDS704G21
header.label: Complete the linkage to the existing case

field.label: Do you have any additional notes or comments to add to the existing Case?
field.name: rad_addnotes

html.name: ahtm_AT29Q456
html.content:
Thank-you anyway for taking the time and trouble to report this [txt_issuelowercase].

Ask the customer for the additional notes they want to add to the Case and add them with the button. Then continue with the Script.

html.name: ahtm_PZJ6XZ85
html.content:
Thank-you anyway for taking the time and trouble to report this [typeofissue].

You may now close your browser window.

html.name: ahtm_NQJ8F350
html.content:
Thank-you anyway for taking the time and trouble to report this [typeofissue].

Workflow complete - continue with the script

html.name: html_SIP08B36
html.content: If you need to change any of these details, please use the "Back" buttons or navigate the relevant page. Otherwise if you now wish to send in this report, please click the "Send the report" button and wait for the confirmation code to appear.

field.label: Associated With
field.helptext: Set the default or populate the field with the "associated with" text for the survey email
field.name: txt_survey_associatedwith

field.label: Issue Type
field.helptext: Complete the default with the issue type to appear in the survey email
field.name: txt_survey_issuetype

html.name: html_65Y2SYG2

Application is completed
